item.title: Using Java FlightRecorder and JDK Mission Control
item.author: brice.dutheil@gmail.com (Brice Dutheil)
item.description: Java Flight Recorder, the profiler you can use in production, continuously. Flight Recorder has been available before in the JDK, e.g. it shipped as part of the JDK 8, but to use it, it demanded a to set specific commercial VM flags to unlock FlightRecorder, this is not anymore necessary with Java 11.
